```{r setup}
library(applicable)
```

### Hat values scoring methods
```{r}
predictors <- mtcars[, -1]

# Data frame interface
mod <- apd_hat_values(predictors)

# Formula interface
mod2 <- apd_hat_values(mpg ~ ., mtcars)

# Recipes interface
library(recipes)
rec <- recipe(mpg ~ ., mtcars)
rec <- step_log(rec, disp)
mod3 <- apd_hat_values(rec, mtcars)
```

### Principal component analysis
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
data(biomass, package = "recipes")

biomass_ad <- apd_pca(biomass[, 3:7])

autoplot(biomass_ad)
# Using selectors in `...`
autoplot(biomass_ad, distance) + scale_x_log10()
autoplot(biomass_ad, matches("PC[1-2]"))
```
